verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu saba nija-bhakta-gaṇe
sabākāre śrī-haste dilā mālya-candane

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; saba—all; nija-bhakta-gaṇe—personal devotees; sabākāre—unto all of them; śrī-haste—with His own hand; dilā—delivered; mālya-candane—flower garlands and sandalwood pulp.
translation: After this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu offered flower garlands and sandalwood pulp to all His devoted personal associates.
